creator: epikhinm@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 30575
patch for trunk-jmeter

With this patch user can set minimum response time for store results. It's very good functionality for fast detect slow samplers :)

One way to do this currently is to add a Duratuon Assertion.

This will flag the responses as failed, and a Listener can be configured to save only failed responses.

I'm not convinced it's necessary to add a duration special case to the ResultCollector.
creator: sebb@apache.org

text: And what if you have ~100 samplers in test plan? Try to add duration assertion for each sampler?
creator: epikhinm@gmail.com

text:
That is really a question for the JMeter user list.

But Assertions apply to all samplers in scope, so just put it at the same level or higher.
creator: sebb@apache.org
